results.title: Imatinib revives the therapeutic potential of metformin on ewing sarcoma by attenuating tumor hypoxic response and inhibiting convergent signaling pathways.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Imatinib_Mesylate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068877 @@@Imatinib@@@ revives the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Sarcoma_Ewing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012512 @@@ewing sarcoma@@@ by attenuating @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D002534 @@@hypoxic@@@ response and inhibiting convergent signaling pathways.

results.title: Metabolic modulation of Ewing sarcoma cells inhibits tumor growth and stem cell properties
